name: File Server MCP
description: Secure file system access for AI assistants using the official MCP filesystem server with additional platform integration and configuration options.
author: MCP Platform

allowed_directories.title: Allowed Directories
allowed_directories.description: List of directories the server can access. Paths will be mounted and validated for security.

read_only_mode.title: Read-Only Mode
read_only_mode.description: Enable read-only mode to prevent any file modifications

enable_symlinks.title: Enable Symlink Resolution
enable_symlinks.description: Allow following symbolic links (with security validation)

max_file_size.title: Max File Size (MB)
max_file_size.description: Maximum file size for read operations in megabytes

exclude_patterns.title: Exclude Patterns
exclude_patterns.description: Glob patterns for files/directories to exclude from operations

enable_audit.title: Enable Audit Logging
enable_audit.description: Enable detailed audit logging of file operations

max_concurrent_operations.title: Max Concurrent Operations
max_concurrent_operations.description: Maximum number of concurrent file operations

timeout_ms.title: Operation Timeout (ms)
timeout_ms.description: Timeout for file operations in milliseconds

cache_enabled.title: Enable Caching
cache_enabled.description: Enable file content caching for better performance

metrics_enabled.title: Enable Metrics
metrics_enabled.description: Enable performance and health metrics collection

capabilities.name: File Operations
capabilities.description: Read, write, and edit files with security validation
capabilities.example: Read configuration files, create documents, update source code

capabilities.name: Directory Management
capabilities.description: List, create, and navigate directory structures
capabilities.example: Browse project folders, create new directories, organize files

capabilities.name: File Search
capabilities.description: Search for files by name, extension, or content patterns
capabilities.example: Find all .js files, locate configuration files, search by content

capabilities.name: Security & Validation
capabilities.description: Path traversal protection and security validation
capabilities.example: Prevent access to system files, validate file paths, enforce permissions

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read complete contents of a file with support for head/tail operations

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: Create new file or overwrite existing with security checks

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: List directory contents with file type indicators

tools.name: search_files
tools.description: Recursively search for files matching patterns with exclusion support

ports.description: MCP server stdio interface (typically not exposed)
